body_html:
Identity: CPU 
Assign: CPU 
Variable: KPU CPU

This is saying that these three groups of nodes needed to colocated on a single device, but the only common device implementation was CPU, so these nodes could not be placed on KPU.

If you register "Identity" and "Assign" on KPU, these three nodes could then be colocated together on KPU.

(Also, you'll want to register them for at least DT_FLOAT, since that's what you're currently using).

(Also, you'll want to register them for at least DT_FLOAT, since that's what you're currently using).
body:
```
Identity: CPU 
Assign: CPU 
Variable: KPU CPU 
```

This is saying that these three groups of nodes needed to colocated on a single device, but the only common device implementation was CPU, so these nodes could not be placed on KPU.

If you register "Identity" and "Assign" on KPU, these three nodes could then be colocated together on KPU.

(Also, you'll want to register them for at least DT_FLOAT, since that's what you're currently using).
